posts._title: Jacques Maillot – La mer à boire (2011)
posts.title: La mer à boire
posts.excerpt: George, a shipyard owner, is dumped by the bank and forced to lay off many of his workers, which immediately begin a strike and occupy the factory. He will have to fight to the end to try to save the company he spent his life building.

posts.title: Shu jia zuo ye
